title: Spongebob's Original Name
content: The show's title was initially SpongeBoy Ahoy!. SpongeBoy was a copyrighted name for a mop, however, but Hillenburg made sure to keep the "sponge" in the name of his protagonist as he was worried that children might mistake him for a block of cheese.

title: Martha...
content: Martha Please come Home. I am so lost without you. I miss you, the kids miss you, our dog misses you. I'll do better Marthy, please come back.

title: My Leg Fish
content: Fred's name was revealed in the episode "Patty Hype." He is known in various episodes, spanning seasons and years, for crying "My leg!" while under duress.
